title: Income distribution (percentages) in the Northeast US
description:
Description
Income distribution (percentages) in the Northeast US in 1960 and 1970
adopted from McCullagh (1980).

parameters.pct: percentage of population in income class per year.
parameters.income: income groups. The unit is thousands of constant (1973) US dollars.

format:
year
year.


pct
percentage of population in income class per year.


income
income groups. The unit is thousands of constant (1973) US dollars.
